name: golfe
description:
"Golf is a fun and relaxing sport"

-Everyone

golfe is the total opposite. Play a  game  where you only get one shot to sink a putt, and have to do that all while avoiding and using black and white holes, and spikes. If you fail, try again. Either way, you'll still lose. It's golf. Nobody wins in golf.

It's not pretty. It's not easy. It's golfe.
